New Records: Pete Alonso hit a go-ahead home run while trailing in the ninth inning or later of a winner-take-all playoff game
Key Match Events: Devin Williams hit Jesse Winker with a fastball, allowing Winker to steal second and score on a single from Starling Marte to give New York a 4-2 lead
Reliever David Peterson induced a game-ending double play ball to Francisco Lindor
Post-Match Reflections: New York will face the Philadelphia Phillies in the NLDS, marking the first time the two fierce rivals have ever met in the postseason
Every team to have eliminated the Brewers from the playoffs has gone on to reach the Fall Classic
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets' comeback victory in the decisive Game 3 gave them their first playoff series win since claiming the NL pennant in 2015
New York went 6-7 against the Phillies during the regular season and finished six games behind them in the NL East standings
